code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Loader=_ref=>{let{size='md',color='blue'}=_ref;const sizeClasses={sm:'w-4 h-4',md:'w-8 h-8',lg:'w-12 h-12',xl:'w-16 h-16'};const colorClasses={blue:'text-blue-600',green:'text-green-600',red:'text-red-600',gray:'text-gray-600',white:'text-white'};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex justify-center items-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"animate-spin rounded-full border-b-2 border-current ".concat(sizeClasses[size]," ").concat(colorClasses[color])})});};export default Loader;
